name: MiniPin
description:
My first try creating a pinball game. The behavior of interactive pinball mechanics are recreated by simple Unity physics interactions.

Controls:

  • A/left - left flipper
  • D/right - right flipper
  • N - new game
  • Esc - exit
  • Left Shift/Right Shift - nudge table (use rarely)

Features:

  • 1-4 player hotseat game
  • Activate rollovers to play modes with dropshots, mushroom bumpers or the ramp
  • Trap the ball in the kickout hole
  • Extend playtime with save ball, recovery post and extra ball (also get a random extra ball by matching score digits with random number)
  • Lock multiple balls to start a multi ball play
  • Get end-of-ball bonus for keeping the ball in play for a number of actions

Currently missing:

  • Fine tuning of bumper movements
  • Scoreboard
